post_text: Carson City-Crystal Colorguard team and percussion section will be holding a cornhole tournament on Saturday, June 1 beginning at 5:00 PM, with registration beginning at 4:30 PM. Money will be due upon arrival to the tournament. Please send team name and participant names to Erin Verwys at everwys@cccschools.org. Looking forward to seeing you all there!

All,

This winter has been anything but typical and Carson City-Crystal will definitely be making- up snow days this year. The question is how many. Our district currently has missed 15 days of learning. With that stated CC-C will be adding back a day of instruction on President's Day, which was originally a scheduled Professional Development Day for Teachers. To reiterate ALL students are to report for school on Monday the 18th of February. All departments, including transportation, will be running as usual. Additionally, Carson City-Crystal will need to extend the school year to meet the state required days and hours. We are confident that will at least include the first week of June, the 3rd through the 7th. Hopefully, by communicating this news now it will allow everyone the opportunity adjust accordingly.

Thank you,
Superintendent Murphy
